product_name: 686 Smarty Original Cargo 3-in-1 Insulated Pants - Men's
long_description: The 686 Smarty Original Cargo 3-in-1 Insulated pants outfit you for a day of all-mountain and park shredding. Nylon shell features INFIDRY-15(TM) waterproof, breathable coating and fully taped seams for a robust waterproof construction. Zip-out 250g fleece liner pants can be paired with shell pants for the ultimate in warmth and weather protection, or either layer can be worn solo in appropriate weather. Ventilate on the fly with leg vents; mesh gussets prevent snow from sneaking in when vents are open. Articulated knees improve comfort and range of motion; waistband tabs customize fit. Lower leg openings expand in a snap for easy on and off. Integrated leg gaiters keep snow from sneaking into your boots; compatible with Boa(R) Lacing System boots. Includes pant-to-jacket powder skirt connection points to hook up to compatible jackets. Goggles chamois cloth included. Keep small essentials close at hand with thigh cargo pockets, zippered thigh pocket, small waist stash, back pocket and lower leg stash. Front hip pockets on the Smarty Original Cargo 3-in-1 insulated pants from 686 feature key clip and glove loop attachments.
short_description: The 686 Smarty Original Cargo 3-in-1 Insulated pants outfit you for a day of all-mountain and park shredding.
